text: tavada visvasa kalavun sadaha upamavak lesa allah firavunge biriya idiripat kaleya. “mage paramadhipatiyaneni, numba abiyasa (svarga) uyane nivasak ma venuven idi kara denu mænava ! tavada firavungen da ohuge (napuru) kriyaven da ma mudava ganu mænava ! tavada aparadhakari janayagen ma mudava ganu mænava !” yæyi æya pavasa sitiyaya
